hero.title: Volunteers
hero.subtitle: More Flexibility, More Gains, More Impact.
hero.subSubtitle:
Connect to impactful projects changing the world in a myriad of ways. 
Use your technical experience and do good at the same time. You will develop new technical and leadership skills while significantly helping social impact projects.

block1intro.title: Our software allows you to focus on what's most important: doing good.

items.title: Ease of Use
items.paragraph:
We have designed a seamless approach to make researching and starting projects a straightforward and rewarding experience. 
As a volunteer, you’re able to give your time and skills on your own schedule.

items.title: Centralization
items.paragraph:
We care about quality over quantity, ensuring you are perfectly matched to projects and social organizations that fits not only your skills but your interests. 
Consider Ovio as a   shop for skill-based volunteering from a 10-minutes code review to long-term involvement.

items.title: Personalization
items.paragraph:
Over time, our software gets to know you and will continuously improve finding the best match for you. 
You’ll be able to volunteers alongside other talented developers from around the world.

block3howto.title: How to sign up?
block3howto.subtitle: Sound like Ovio is a place for you to give back?

processItems.text: Logging in with GitHub to Explore now and access 200+ open source projects.
Fill out your profile to get matched to more projects.
Ovio proactively will be looking for the best opportunities to have an impact with your amazing skills. <tag>mentoring<tag> <tag>project-based<tag> <tag>task-based<tag>

hero.title: Social Impact Organizations
hero.subtitle: Better Help, Better Cooperation, Better Scales.
hero.subSubtitle: Are you leveraging technology and software to maximize your impact on the world? Do you need access to a pool of talented, technically skilled volunteers to develop or scale technology?

items.title: Leverage Technology
items.paragraph: Create maintainable code and lower development costs with our platform. We help you use and develop software more collaboratively, using open-source.

items.title: Showcase your impactful project
items.paragraph: Expose your code and showcase your mission to a world-wide community of do-gooders.

items.title: Attract volunteers
items.paragraph:
Access a pool of talented volunteers and engage them on your project. 
They are vetted to match your projects and issue areas with their skills and interests.

block3howto.title: How to apply?
block3howto.subtitle: By focusing on coding, we transform micro-volunteering opportunities into long term impact.

processItems.title: Submit
processItems.text: Submit your project and get access to a pool of committed volunteers. We match your needs with volunteers’ talents and interests to ensure your project’s viability.

processItems.title: Or request
processItems.text: Send us an email and request our consulting services.
